website_summaries.verdict: Doodlers and those who like to take notes by hand will love this inexpensive smartphone, complete with stylus, that lets users customize writing and drawing.
pros: Security controls include fingerprint sensor and knock code
Easy access to built-in pen, and phone will indicate when it's popped up so it won't get lost
Large display for viewing photos, video, or creating artwork
cons: Audio is on the poor side, according to several users
Screen is delicate and cracks easily, so we advise a case as protection
